title: Apple hit with lawsuit for alleged sexual harassment on Apple TV+ film set
content:
In a report from Bloomberg, Apple is facing a lawsuit by a woman working on the set of the upcoming film Emancipation. Emancipation is an upcoming thriller on Apple TV+ starring Will Smith.

more…

The post Apple hit with lawsuit for alleged sexual harassment on Apple TV+ film set appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple has been sued by a woman working on its upcoming film 'Emancipation' after claims it did nothing to stop sexual harassment on the set.
